Renato Nobre <renato.avellarnobre@studenti.unimi.it>

Changes:

31/05/2022 Python Edition

class utils.logger.Logger(name)[source]

Logger class file for standard output and file logging.

Parameters

name (str) – Name of the logger. Usually pass __name__.

name

Name of the logger.

Type

str

verbose_flag

Verbose flag.

Type

bool

_log(text, type='')[source]

Logger template function.

Parameters

  • text (str) – Message to log

  • type (str, optional) – Type of message. Defaults to “”.

verbose(text)[source]

Verbose specialized logger.

Note

Only log if VERBOSE is set on config.py.

Parameters

text (str) – Message to log
